message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a chance to own this valuable product.  Given its value, I'm asking for $14,000.  What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that.
I understand your perspective, Bob, but $10,000 is significantly below its true value. To reach a compromise, I'm willing to come down to $12,500. This feels like a fair deal considering its worth.

I understand that the product has value, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer $11,250. I think this is a fair compromise considering the product's worth and my budget.
